creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two-paneled screen with silver background; each panel has two gold fans; R panel: moss-covered tree with white blossoms; red chrysanthemums with blue flowers; L panel: tree with arced limbs and bushy clumps of foliage; blue wave cresting in front of red sun
marks: Signature and Seal R edge (right fan); ULC (left fan): [ 雪佳、雪佳 ]
medium: Ink, colors, and gold on silk
title: Two-panel folding screen
